publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

tls:text.tls:line: Before Heaven and Earth it was born,

sense.def: originate; come to emerge; be naturally found in (of inanimate subjects), occur naturally in

tls:text.tls:line: and it is only abstract form, without physical shape.

sense.def: to be; to be only (the object in question)

tls:text.tls:line: and it is only abstract form, without physical shape.

sense.def: abstract symbolic shape or image; symbol, symbolisation

tls:text.tls:line: and it is only abstract form, without physical shape.

sense.def: abstract term for the concrete physical visible shape and manifestation of something [Note that paradoxically the notion of "concrete" is highly abstract.]

tls:text.tls:line: it is vastly tranquil, it is diffusely vast;

sense.def: be limpid, tranquil and serene; be unperturbed; be placid (like the sea)

tls:text.tls:line: it is vastly tranquil, it is diffusely vast;
When forced to make a name for it
Encompassing Heaven and Earth,

sense.def: get together, gather as a group or a unit

tls:text.tls:line: Encompassing Heaven and Earth,
it flows forth, flowing from its [own proper] source
When one deploys it, one in no way uses it up,

sense.def: deploy, make generous use of; make practical use of (e.g. a scaling ladder); exercise; dole out; apply

tls:text.tls:line: When one deploys it, one in no way uses it up,

sense.def: use up, exhaust (the years of one's life etc)

tls:text.tls:line: in no way does it have a morning or an evening [being quite constant at all times],
yet when one mark it out/points to it, it fills not even one fist.

sense.def: make public, make widely known, advertise openly; mark out

tls:text.tls:line: yet when one mark it out/points to it, it fills not even one fist.

sense.def: fill (primarily a container or a depression in the earth)

tls:text.tls:line: yet when one mark it out/points to it, it fills not even one fist.

sense.def: hand, fist (insofar as these may be used as "containers")

tls:text.tls:line: It is restrained but capable of expansion

sense.def: be concise, be short; be constrained

tls:text.tls:line: and stood in the center;
their spirits roamed with Creation,

sense.def: substantial and typically irreversible transformation into something new; natural transformation

tls:text.tls:line: and thus they comforted all in the four quarters

sense.def: to pacify, bring peace to, look well after the concerns of; euphemistic for "subjugate"

tls:text.tls:line: and thus they comforted all in the four quarters

sense.def: all the Four Regions, the whole world; all sorts of places

tls:text.tls:line: Thus the Way
effects the movement of the heavens and the stability of the earth,
effects the movement of the heavens and the stability of the earth,

sense.def: course along on a revolving circular course (typically said of stars in the Heavens)

tls:text.tls:line: turning endlessly like a wheel,
turning endlessly like a wheel,
flowing ceaselessly like water.
flowing ceaselessly like water.
flowing ceaselessly like water.

sense.def: stop, fail to go on doing what one was doing; desist MOVE THESE TO THE NEXT LEXEME ENTRY

tls:text.tls:line: flowing ceaselessly like water.

sense.def: be at rest; take temporary abode; come to rest; be inactive, fail to engage in action

tls:text.tls:line: It is there at the beginning and end of things.

sense.def: go through cyclic transformations or changes

tls:text.tls:line: thunder rumbles, and rain falls,
thunder rumbles, and rain falls,
thunder rumbles, and rain falls,
it responds in concert infinitely.

sense.def: shoulder to shoulder, together, side by side; momentaneously; at the same time; 十日並出

tls:text.tls:line: It returns the carved and polished

sense.def: be engraved; be engraved with (patterns); be carved into

tls:text.tls:line: It returns the carved and polished
to simplicity
to simplicity
It does not contrive to do this

sense.def: by the method of non-assertive action

tls:text.tls:line: It does not contrive to express this

sense.def: by the method of non-assertive action

tls:text.tls:line: It involves a peaceful happiness that is without pride,
There are myriad differences
it harmonises dark and light,

sense.def: establish harmonious relations with; make harmonious, bring proper harmony to; pacify

tls:text.tls:line: regulates the four seasons,

sense.def: temper, moderate; be moderate with respect to

tls:text.tls:line: and tunes the forces of nature.

sense.def: to blend properly, to make harmonious; tune up (instruments); attune (e.g. one's speech to circumstances etc)

tls:text.tls:line: It moistens the vegetable world,
permeates the mineral world.
The beasts grow large,

sense.def: birds and beasts; a mere animal

tls:text.tls:line: their coats lustrous;
animals do not die in the womb.
animals do not die in the womb.
Parents do not suffer the grief of losing their children,

sense.def: to lose; lose by death; lose all control of (one's state); lose all interest in

tls:text.tls:line: Parents do not suffer the grief of losing their children,

sense.def: conduct proper funeral rites for (the dead)

tls:text.tls:line: siblings do not experience the sadness of losing each other.

sense.def: lament, wail about; conduct ritual wailing on the occasion of the funeral of

tls:text.tls:line: Children are not orphaned,

sense.def: mere (uncapped) adolescent, little brat; boy; (but note that the word can also refer to a girl)

tls:text.tls:line: Children are not orphaned,
women are not widowed.
Atmospheric signs of ill omen are not seen,
bandits do not roam.
bandits do not roam.
All this is brought about by inner virtue.

sense.def: hold in one's mouth> encompass; have within one, contain

tls:text.tls:line: All this is brought about by inner virtue.
it cannot be imagined;

sense.def: Heaven and Earth (> everything/everywhere); this world
what is dirty; what is murky; what is impure
animals (general); the animal (of the season etc)
that which is firm, the firm and strong things; a hard substance
originate; come to emerge; be naturally found in (of inanimate subjects), occur naturally in
subtle spirit; subtle spirits [occasionally: essential sprits; vital forces][CA]; soul as seat of thought
be based in, have one's roots in MENG 仁義禮智根於心。that is to say, benevolence, rightness, the rites and wisdom, is rooted in his heart.
place where something comes from and belongs
return, get back to where one came from; make one's return; flee back
abstract and metaphorical: root; basis; karmic basis (BUDDH.: orig. tr. SANSKRIT indriya or mūla; see http://www.buddhism-dict.net/cgi-bin/xpr-ddb.pl?68.xml+id('b6839'))
impersonal pronoun: one, oneself (as opposed to other things) 自我 (cf. 自我加冕 "be self-congratulatory)
how on earth? How on earth could you/he/I? 回何敢死？ 丘何敢乎？何足憂？
model oneself after; emulate, take as a model, follow as a method; (See also IMITATE)
accord with, act in accordance with (something stable and preexisting); adapt properly to; conform to the ways of
keep to; be constrained by N 拘於俗
accord with, act in accordance with (something stable and preexisting); adapt properly to; conform to the ways of
realm of the spirits; the deities, the gods; sometimes explicitly: the gods of Heaven and Earth 天地之神明
subtle spirit; subtle spirits [occasionally: essential sprits; vital forces][CA]; soul as seat of thought
the One; unity; inner unity; oneness and total concentration 得一 "attain to oneness"
the One; unity; inner unity; oneness and total concentration 得一 "attain to oneness"
(receive>) be on the receiving end of Nab-ing 受公仲侈之怨也(!)
the various changes in the world; all kinds of change
be fat, rich, productive; be fattening; be greasy; be just grease

CHEMLA 2003: outside, exterior part of a mathematical figure. This concept is in this specific sense is particularly common in the commentaries JZ 9, whereas the meaning "gnomon" is attested in the main text of that chapter. The more general meaning "outside" is not specifically relevant to mathematics. When one square is marked out within another as in [ILL 1], the unmarked rectilinear part of the original square is referred to by the technical term jǔ 矩, and this kind of remaining shape in general is called the biǎo 表. In JZ 9.24 矩之表 refers to the remaining part in the shape of (two) jǔ 矩.
HF 8.7.9: live after the image of (Heaven and Earth), emulate; to imitate something, to take something as model
bright objects; sources of light (in the heavens)
limb 四肢 "the four limbs (excluding head)"
opening to the outside world, aperture; hollow; hole
joints in the body 百節,三百六十節
often abstract and technical vt: be similar in basic kind; resemble
mind (Most of these examples are really nab(post-N) or nab[post-N]. The subdivision has not been implemented so far.)BUDDH: skr. citta (the concept of 心 in Buddhist texts is extremely complicated!)
blood energy> blood, physical energies; vital spirits
OBI 5: disaster (from Heaven/Nature; occasionally self-inflicted as in CC 9.1); the reference is sometimes to a fire
blood energy> blood, physical energies; vital spirits

even more than before; the more... the more; ever more

sense.def: externally; on the outside; as a visible expression; towards the outside

tls:text.tls:srcline: 以言精神不可使外淫也。

sense.def: cause N to V, bring it about that N V-s 使之聞之 [NB: the first 之shows that the object of 使 does function as an object and not only as a subject of wén 聞. Thus technically speaking we do not have a sentence after the vt.]

cause N to V, bring it about that N V-s 使之聞之 [NB: the first 之shows that the object of 使 does function as an object and not only as a subject of wén 聞. Thus technically speaking we do not have a sentence after the vt.]
opting for and opting against, opting for or opting against; choices, preferences

cause N to V, bring it about that N V-s 使之聞之 [NB: the first 之shows that the object of 使 does function as an object and not only as a subject of wén 聞. Thus technically speaking we do not have a sentence after the vt.]

physical body as opposed to the Self which has this body (without being identical with it)
